## Build & Scripts
| Script | Purpose |
|--------|---------|
| `pnpm build` | Turborepo build (all packages) |
| `pnpm prebuild` | Validate CODEBASE.md freshness + PURPOSE.md existence |
| `node scripts/generate-codebase-map.mjs` | Regenerate this file |
